channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Network Data Loss Prevention
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Network Data Loss Prevention

item.title: CVE-2017-3935|2024-09-16T16:48:06.661Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Network Data Loss Prevention is vulnerable to MIME type sniffing which allows older versions of Internet Explorer to perform MIME-sniffing on the response body, potentially causing the response body to be interpreted and displayed as a content type other than the intended content type.
